Package remodel.expr

Class Expression

java.lang.Object
remodel.expr.Expression
All Implemented Interfaces:
PriorityCodes
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConditionalExpression, IdentifierExpression, LiteralExpression, MultipleExpression, OperatorExpression, WrappedExpression
public abstract class Expression
extends java.lang.Object
implements PriorityCodes
Expression is the abstract ancestor of all expression types.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Anthony J H Simons

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface remodel.expr.PriorityCodes

    ADDSUB_PRIORITY, ANDOR_PRIORITY, ASSIGN_PRIORITY, ATOMIC_PRIORITY, COMPARE_PRIORITY, EQUALS_PRIORITY, MULTDIV_PRIORITY, PAREN_PRIORITY, POWER_PRIORITY, UNARY_PRIORITY

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Expression()
    Creates an Expression.

  • Constructor Details

    • Expression

      public Expression()
      Creates an Expression.

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public abstract java.lang.String getType()
      The type of this Expression. Most types must be inferred.
      Returns:
      the type of this Expression.

    • getOwner

      public Expression getOwner()
      Returns the Expression owning this Expression in the call-graph. The root of the call-graph has no owner.
      Returns:
      the owner of this Expression.

    • setOwner

      public void setOwner​(Expression expression)
      Sets the Expression owning this Expression in the call-graph.
      Parameters:
      expression - the Expression dominating this Expression.

    • getOperation

      public Operation getOperation()
      Returns the Operation or Rule owning this Expression. This Expression is indirectly connected, by a tree of owners, to an Operation or Rule. By default, this method delegates to the owner of this Expression.
      Returns:
      an Executable, the owning Operation or Rule.

    • isBinary

      public boolean isBinary()
      Reports whether this is a BinaryExpression. By default this is false for all kinds of Expression except BinaryExpression.
      Returns:
      true if this is a BinaryExpression, false otherwise.

    • findConcept

      public Concept findConcept​(java.lang.String type)
      Looks up a Concept by its type name in the current context.
      Parameters:
      type - the type name of the Concept.
      Returns:
      the Concept, or null.

    • findProperty

      public Property findProperty​(java.lang.String name)
      Looks up a Property by its name in the current context.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Property.
      Returns:
      the Property, or null.

    • getPrecedence

      public int getPrecedence()
      Returns the precedence of this Expression. The default value is ATOMIC_PRIORITY. Overridden in some subclasses of Expression.
      Returns:
      the precedence.

    • getNesting

      public int getNesting()
      Returns an estimate of the depth of nesting of this Expression. This is used by some writers to control the layout.
      Returns:
      zero by default; overridden in subclasses.

    • precedes

      public boolean precedes​(Expression expression)
      Reports whether this Expression has higher precedence than the other Expression. This may be used to restructure BinaryExpressions.
      Parameters:
      expression - the other Expression.
      Returns:
      true if this Expression has higher precedence.

    • writeUsing

      public abstract void writeUsing​(ExpressionVisitor visitor) throws java.io.IOException
      Receives an ExpressionVisitor to write out this kind of Expression. This follows the Visitor Design Pattern idiom.
      Parameters:
      visitor - the ExpressionVisitor.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an output fault occurs.
